## Programming with dplyr


One of the new things is the programming with dplyr. The following shows what it is


```{r}
library(dplyr)
df <- data_frame(cat1 = rep(c("A", "B"), each = 3), 
                 cat2 = rep(c("X", "Y"), 3), 
                 value = 1:6)


var <- quo(cat1)

group_by(df, UQE(var)) %>% 
  summarize(s = sum(value))

```
